name: The Sound Of Tezos
description:
Our collaboration with Solonnaire.

The artwork was generated from the transactions completed on September 24th 2021 on the Tezos mainnet.
Each colored pixel represents a unique address that participated in these transactions. For the initial frame, the brightness of the pixel corresponds to how many transactions the address participated in during the chosen day. The remaining frames were generated using custom code.

Let the sound take you into the depth of the blockchain
